movies.title: All I Want for Christmas
movies.plot: An attractive young woman unexpectedly meets santa's helper, st nick, who grants her an extraordinary Christmas wish.
movies.simplePlot: An attractive young woman unexpectedly meets santa's helper, st nick, who grants her an extraordinary Christmas wish.

biography.bio: Born into a political family, Melissa Sagemiller started her path to the performing arts at a very young age. At age three, she began to study dance - tap, ballet, jazz and modern. After responding to an ad in the Washington Post, she made her stage debut at 9 as "Dill" in "To Kill a Mockingbird". Soon she became a regular on local DC stages. Acting took a back seat when Eileen Ford discovered Melissa in a Manhattan jewelry store at the age of 14. Modeling took her to New York and Paris. Soon she left Paris and followed through with her initial desire to go to The University of Virginia and resume a "normal" student life studying Art History. When she decided to return to acting full time, she began studying at The Stella Adler Conservatory, NYU's Stonestreet Studio and at the Michael Howard Studio. Her professional life as an actor began shortly thereafter.
biography.name: Melissa Sagemiller

biography.bio: Brad Rowe was born on May 15, 1970 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA as Bradley Thomas Rowe. He is an actor and producer, known for Shelter (2007), National Treasure: Book of Secrets (2007) and Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss (1998). He has been married to Lisa Fiori since September 18, 1999. They have one child.
biography.name: Brad Rowe

biography.bio: Tom Arnold was born in Ottumwa, Iowa, to Linda (Graham) and Jack Arnold. After his parents divorced, he was raised by his father. In 1983, he got his first taste of stand-up comedy when he performed at open microphone nights at the University of Iowa. Tom's comedy career had its ups and downs over the next several years until 1988, when he entered the Minneapolis Comedy Competition and won first place. With this victory in hand, he decided to move to Los Angeles to pursue a stand-up comedy career. Once he hit Los Angeles, things happened fast. That same year, he was hired as a staff writer for Roseanne Barr's TV sitcom Roseanne (1988) and began to appear regularly on the show as "Arnie Thomas". He and Roseanne Barr were married in 1990, with Arnold converting to Judaism prior to the marriage. They formed Rapello County Productions to develop projects for themselves. The couple's marriage, together with their sometimes outrageous behavior, attracted media attention - and especially that of the tabloids - like a magnet. In 1994 conditions between the two deteriorated and they went through a very public, and acrimonious, divorce. Tom has been married twice since then and is the co-host of Fox Sports Net's talk show The Best Damn Sports Show Period (2001). He also does voiceover work, and provides the voice for the "Oven Mitt" character in the TV commercials for the Arby's restaurant chain.
biography.name: Tom Arnold

biography.bio: Marliss Amiea is an actress, known for The Christmas Gift (2015), 12 Wishes of Christmas (2011) and The Wish List (2010).
biography.name: Marliss Amiea

biography.bio: Eddie Deezen was born on March 6, 1957 in Cumberland, Maryland, USA as Edward Harry Dezen. He is an actor, known for The Polar Express (2004), Grease (1978) and The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water (2015).
biography.name: Eddie Deezen

biography.bio: Michael Gaglio is known for his work on The Halfway House (2004), Titanic II (2010) and American Bandits: Frank and Jesse James (2010).
biography.name: Michael Gaglio

biography.bio: Christian Gehring is an actor and director, known for The Brink (2015), Bones (2005) and Modern Family (2009).
biography.name: Christian Gehring

biography.bio: Laura Gordon is an actress and producer, known for Saw V (2008), Apricot (2009) and Face to Face (2011).
biography.name: Laura Gordon

biography.bio: Ed Halligan is an actor, known for 12 Wishes of Christmas (2011), House of Secrets (2014) and All I Want for Christmas (2013).
biography.name: Ed Halligan

biography.bio: Dylan Hobbs is an actor, known for Where Birds Don't Fly (2017), Joker Rising (2013) and Killer Reality (2013).
biography.name: Dylan Hobbs

biography.bio: Martin Klebba was born on June 23, 1969 in Troy, Michigan, USA. He is known for his work on Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales (2017), Scrubs (2001) and Project X (2012). He has been married to Michelle Dilgard since June 18, 2011.
biography.name: Martin Klebba

biography.bio: Danny Lacy is an actor and director, known for Correcting Christmas (2014), Crack-Duck (2014) and Abashed (2014).
biography.name: Danny Lacy

biography.bio: Caitlyn Leone, twin sister to actor Michael Leone, is an American actress who has been working since the age of 4. She is most known for her role of Casey Ross on Scandal, and her episodes of Modern Family and Greys Anatomy. She has also appeared in a few television movies and numerous commercials. Many recognize her as the "donut girl" from the Special K commercial or as the main tired school girl in her Claritin commercial.
biography.name: Caitlyn Leone

biography.bio: Michael Leone is known for his work on Mr. Church (2016), General Hospital (1963) and Moms' Night Out (2014).
biography.name: Michael Leone

biography.bio: Tracy Mulholland is an actress and writer, known for Crazy, Stupid, Love. (2011), Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street (2014) and Grace Note (2016).
biography.name: Tracy Mulholland
